title: Provided that when the rain water in exceptional circumstances will be utilised for drinking and/ or cooking purpose, it shall be ensured that proper filter arrangement and the separate outlet for by passing the first rain-water has been provided
clause_text: Provided that when the rain water in exceptional circumstances will be utilised for drinking and/ or cooking purpose, it shall be ensured that proper filter arrangement and the separate outlet for by passing the first rain-water has been provided.
